description:
The world’s most brilliant minds fail to find a reason for the sudden incapacitation of all G-Reaction engines, but Lotta solves the problem with one false step. Armed with this new knowledge, Penny and Billy undertake a daring rescue mission.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Falle der Außerirdischen: Invincible, bitte melden!
The Alien`s Trap! Do You Read Us, Invincible?!
Yuuseijin no Wana! Invincible-gou Outou Seyo!
遊星人の罠! インビンシブル号応答せよ!
